name: Sheraton Mirage Resort & Spa

reviews.title: Legen-(wait for it.................) dary!!!!!
reviews.text: Stayed for a night in February. Despite other reviews about Terraces the new refurb gives it a great Gold Coast relaxed atmosphere. The food at Terraces is amazing and the whole refurb of the hotel is tops! The staff are excellent in both front and back of house. The rooms are spacious and classy! Better than the Versace but that's just my humble opinion!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My loving husband & I TRULY ADORE staying at this superb resort for our romantic get-aways two to 3 times a year! The staff & service here are commendable and we praise them all for ALWAYS providing service with a smile! Rooms are tastefully decorated and the bed is EXTREMELY COMFORTABLE and..... it's like sleeping on clouds: so dreamy!!! The recently refurbished hotel looks chic & fabulous and is, in my opinion, probably more appealing now to younger couples, than it was previously, however it's also greatly appreciated by us (& we're in our early 50's).This is one of our top 2 favourite '5 Star' hotels in Australia and we highly recommend this superb resort to everyone!!! Pamper yourself and stay here, sometime! We all DESERVE the BEST in life & this is one of the BEST!!! Congratulations to hotel management and all the staff and we look forward to being pampered again, very soon!!! THANK YOU!
reviews.title: Pampered like a SUPERSTAR!!!

reviews.text: In recent times the Sheraton Mirage has undergone a major upgrade and refurbishment of it's facilities. Apart from the outer appearances of the hotel the interior is completely new.
reviews.title: Noticeable improvement with refurbishment

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The entrance and foyer is redone and redesigned in a more modern tone. The main restaurant (Oasis) has a totally new look, furniture and feel about it.
reviews.title: top stay

reviews.text: Fortunately, my favourite, The Oyster Bar, is still the same. What they do with the decor is immaterial as long as they continue to serve the best oysters in the world - Sydney rocky's.
reviews.title: Good family fun, but looking forward to pool refurbishment

reviews.text: Took advantage of a Starwood Preferred Guest offer and stayed overnight last night with my husband and two of our friends who were celebrating their anniversary. Both couples received complimentary room upgrades which were greatly appreciated. The rooms have recently been revamped and were very nice. King size beds were so comfortable. We couldn't fault anything.
reviews.title: 1 Night Stopover - Val - Gold Coast

reviews.text: Our deal also included seafood buffet dinner and buffet breakfast in Terraces restaurant which has also recently been revampted. The view when you walk into the foyer and look out across pool area to the oceanside is beautiful We do dine at Terraces restaurant quite often, but have never stayed at the Resort. It was a lovely experience.
reviews.title: Dissappointed, Poor Service overall

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We went to this hotel in the April School holidays. I chose this hotel as it was low rise and I had a recent injury and may have needed some extra help with luggage etc. The problems began after contacting Reservations at the resort. My daughter and I needed 3 things, a microwave, a room that was quiet, centrally located without too many stairs and an early check in if possible. The Reservation assistant gave me an exorbitant price for a microwave, so I called the concierge directly. He told me she misquoted and the rate given was for a weekly hire. After a brief conversation on several issues he stated that the microwave would be complimentary if I decided to book I did not ask for this, he offered it. I sent him an email confirmation as requested and the date and name of the booking.
reviews.title: The little things let it down
Great Gold Coast resort experience!
reviews.text: Upon arrival I asked if there was a ground floor room and was told only if I paid an additional $80 or be closer to construction than we were. The reservation assistant apparently wrote in the system that I refused to pay for a microwave and I wanted it for free. I didn’t get a microwave on arrival. The Concierge (Dale I think) rang, berated me and said I refused to pay, so I was not getting a microwave and he didn’t have any anyway as they were broken.. I explained that I needed it for therapy so would pay anyway, it wasn’t a choice. He said “You will have to hire one from outside of the resort”. Mysteriously a microwave appeared after an hour.

I would be careful about requests however, small or large. I asked about the construction as we had a disastrous holiday overseas with construction for 8 days. I actually said we had got a refund which we had. That was also written in the notes as the concierge said you “want everything for free”. So not the case we have travelled for nearly 30 years (first refund for us). The assistant told me there would be minimal noise but no guarantees.
reviews.title: not worth the money
Great after the refit
reviews.text: We had a lovely stay here. Could not fault the decor of the room after all the money spent on the refit.
Definitely spend he money on a sea view Room on floor 2 or higher!
reviews.title: Excellent rooms!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The seafood buffet was good! But dine later after all the families ave been through!
reviews.title: nice hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Quite a queue for breakfast but again delicious!
reviews.title: Location, location location

reviews.text: Everything at Sheraton made everything seem so perfect on my trip to Gold Coast! The rooms were very clean and service was excellent! Only downside was that the pool was not too clean and there was landscaping work going on in the resort during my stay. However, the excellent service from the staff made up for it! Would definitely return on my next visit to Gold Coast!
reviews.title: Still the best!

reviews.text: How nice it was to return to Mirage after the revamp. Can only imagine it's presence once the gardens etc are done. We booked Ocean view interconnecting rooms and was lucky enough to get an upgrade to a suite.....nice timing for mothers day. Rooms now look fantastic and will now look at booking suites next time - great to have the extra space. The extras for Gold Starwood members were a nice welcome. During our stay we found all the staff to be happy, polite, professional and very attentive staff. The staff around the pool did a great job and good on Ben for always making sure guests were looked after. We are looking forward to travelling the exhaustive 20 minute drive to have another mini break in the next couple of months
reviews.title: Revamp = money well spent

reviews.text: The location for the Gold Coast is just about perfect, gardens giving onto beach but what makes this hotel stand out is the service. Few hotels match it in Australia - the tone of the hotel is all about service - at every level. Lovely pool and a breakfast worth travelling to. Have been here for business and leisure,both experiences were excellent.
reviews.title: location and service -first class

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Having had a few pleasant stays at Sheratons in California, and enjoyed the seafood buffets at the Port Douglas establishment, I thought it a good idea to visit this hotel to help celebrate my wife's 60th, and to also use up an almost expired Amex Platinum Reward.
reviews.title: Sheraton not as expected!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Unfortunately, our experience did not meet with our modest expectations.
reviews.title: Great hotel in a quiet location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 1. An elevator outage meant that we had to have a room change, and despite a request to make sure our bag followed us, it took roughly 2 hours to find us (despite a telephone enquiry). Losing the bag meant that we could not use the pool or spa facilities before our dinner booking.
reviews.title: $20M well spent - can't wait to return !

description: Surrounded by sparkling lagoons and tropical gardens. The Gold Coast's only five star resort to offer an absolute beachfront location.
